name: App-Update-Tracker
summary: AppUpdateTracker is a simple, lightweight iOS library intended to determine basic app install/update behavior.
description: This library allows you to easily determine when the user uses your app after a fresh install, when the user updates your app (and the version from which (s)he updated, and how many times the user has opened a given version of your app. This library was created in order to help determine update information so that appropriate data migration logic could be run after an app update.
